amendment.description: An amendment No. 6 printed in Part A of House Report 114-326 to strike Subtitle C, except section 1314 from the Rules Committee Print.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Cartwright amendment was withdrawn.
Amendment (A048) offered by Mr. Cartwright to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A048) offered by Mr. Cartwright to the Rules amendment (A001).
